Uses of Class
thothbot.squirrel.core.shared.core.Color3f

Packages that use Color3f
thothbot.squirrel.core.client.renderers Here is located WebGL renderer. 
thothbot.squirrel.core.shared.core Contains all core Objects such as Vectors, Matrices and so on which are used overall on the project. 
thothbot.squirrel.core.shared.lights Here are all types of Light Objects used in the Scene. 
thothbot.squirrel.core.shared.materials Here are all Materials used for the Geometric Objects. 
thothbot.squirrel.core.shared.objects Here are all Geometric Objects used in the Scene. 
thothbot.squirrel.core.shared.scenes Here are Scene object - the main rendering object and all Scene additions such as fog. 
thothbot.squirrel.core.shared.utils Contains helper methods which are used overall in the project.
